name: Remnants of the Hundred Acre Wood: The Heffalump
name_original: Remnants of the Hundred Acre Wood: The Heffalump
description:
There once was a wood. The wood was almost completely destroyed to make room for a city filled with people. But then the people all but disappeared, and the wood regrew. Now, the residents of the wood live peacefully atop the ruins of the city. Chief among them, a bear named Winnie-the-Pooh, and his friends.

This is a retelling of Piglet meets a Heffalump from the book Winnie-The-Pooh by A. A. Milne, only it's a text adventure set in a post-apocalypse. The game was created for the Playing with Pooh Game Jam. I hope you enjoy it!

Written in Twine 2.2.1.
